user_query: I am planning a trivia night with my friends and I need some challenging questions. Can you provide me with 50 random questions of different difficulty levels that cover various categories like history, science, and pop culture? Additionally, I would like to include some wisdom quotes about knowledge and learning to set the mood.

TaskList.description: Fetch 50 random trivia questions of varying difficulty levels from different categories including history, science, and pop culture.
Retrieve a selection of wisdom quotes focusing on knowledge and learning to include in the trivia night.
Compile and format the retrieved trivia questions and wisdom quotes into a cohesive document for the trivia night.
